K. Sikka
D. Forster
J. Movellan
G. W. Cottrell
dcterms:description: GERMS is a medium size dataset with approximately 120K images of 136 different objects collected by a robot. The robot examines each object by rotating them in front of the camera at 10 different orientations, aiming to recognize the object for 4 test orientations, given the other 6 in-hand orientations. It is a challenging dataset as it requires the extraction of small visual cues and fine categorization.
dcterms:title: GERMS
